name: Pinchy: A Crab Beat 'em Up
description:
Play as Pinchy, a shell-less hermit crab, who's on a journey to discover a new home. 

Throw claws or projectiles against pesky undersea punks trying to stop you from getting a new shell (Why are they trying to stop you? It's just their thing dw about it).

Brawl your way through different environments and help Pinchy in discovering a new home for himself.

This was initially made for a game jam but spun off as a first time learning project. All art assets, code and music were made by me (Burathat) with help from Aría Jónsdóttir. If you'd like to support me in future dev projects feel free to donate or follow me on twitter: @burathatjunput.
